entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • mono minijit x64 test failure: loopinfinally_do.dll exception #68187
    7.0.0
  • RegexSourceGenerator informational diagnostics are not being displayed on VS text editor nor on the console #68182
    7.0.0
  • FDD app uses DOTNET_ROOT even though it points to wrong architecture #68180
  • SPMI benchmarks run should enable tiered compilation and pgo #68179
  • Infra improvements for Helix #68176
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'isValidGeneralDatasize(size)' during 'Generate code' #68170
  • Missing word in variable's documentation #68169
    7.0.0
  • BackgroundService will not observe exceptions thrown in ExecuteAsync #68165
  • Documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Options and HttpRequestMessage.Parameters #68164
  • The mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers. #68163
  • [tracking] Experimental WebAssembly multithreading support #68162
    7.0.0
  • Dereferencing a pointer to a byte-sized structure reads a DWORD #68157
    7.0.0
  • German text in setup help page is overlapped by program logo #68156
  • [API Proposal]: ISpanFormattable destination length #68154
  • [API Proposal]: `SuppressMessage`/`UnconditionalSuppressMessage` constructor without category #68153
  • Failed to download package DotNetHostPolicy when building in x86 during restore #68152
  • Missing documentation for HttpRequestMessage.Properties #68150
  • [API Proposal]: HttpRequestOptions should implement IReadOnlyDictionary #68149
  • Test failure BasicEventSourceTests.TestsManifestGeneration.Test_EventSource_EtwManifestGenerationRollover #68148
    7.0.0
  • Analyzer/fixer for converting Regex use to source generator #68147
    7.0.0

Closed

  • mscordbi.dll 4.700.22.11601 is missing from symbol servers #67446
  • WPF Trigger won't work #68175
  • [NativeAOT] Httpclient timeout #67537
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer.Deserialize not working for Guid property with protected setter #68155
  • Cannot get Total CPU Usage or Idle with System.Diagnostics.Process.GetProcesses #66942
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'divMod->OperGet() != GT_UMOD' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #68174
  • Add multi-parameter overloads for Math.Max and Math.Min #24737
    Future
  • Consider implementing Ryu algorithm for double.ToString() #10939
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add `IUnaryReciprocalOperators<TSelf>` to `IFloatingPoint<TSelf>` #65939
  • Annotate Microsoft.Extensions.* assemblies for nullable reference types #43605
    7.0.0
  • No tests run in System.Linq.Expressions.Tests with Debug\Checked runtimes #68166
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649/DevDiv_461649.sh #66563
    7.0.0
  • Assert failure: !CREATE_CHECK_STRING(pMT && pMT->Validate()) #67046
    7.0.0
  • ILCompiler does not recognize "sha1" and "sha2" Instruction Sets #68132

PullRequests

Created

  • Use 'unsigned short' instead of 'unsigned'. #68190
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • avoid Reflection in Quic #68189
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • avoid allocating collection for intermediate certificates #68188
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Delete AssemblySpec::m_wszCodeBase #68186
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Fixing casing issue with TargetPath #68184
  • Use generic math to dedup Enumerable.Min/Max #68183
    area-System.Linq
  • Update perf map docs #68181
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Remove usage of !! from dotnet/runtime #68178
  • Only build the GC simulator tests in the GC simulator leg #68177
    area-Infrastructure
  • Expose ArrayMarshaller and PointerArrayMarshaller #68173
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Improve performance of test partitioning #68172
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix a race condition in the thread pool #68171
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • Rev TraceEventVersion to 2.0.77 #68167
    test-enhancement, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Fix JIT using too wide indirections when returning small structs #68160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow custom attribute filtering with an open generic type. #68158
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Overhaul when/where we check for Regex timeouts #68146
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions

Merged

  • Update dump template #68185
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix nullability warnings for NativeAOT CoreLib #65137
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Lift the restriction that we can have at most 4k regions #68168
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Fix compiled / source generated lazy loop stack handling #68138
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Expose APIs for getting the exponent and significand for IFloatingPoint types #68094
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update aka.ms link with NativeAOT optimization guide #68151
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update VSCode library debugging documentation #67925
    documentation
  • Support ByRefLike types as Generic parameters #67783
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • SPMI: fix AV in getStringLiteral #68161
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Exposing generic math support for unsigned right shift #68096
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • JIT ARM32: Force tailcall nullchecks with LR #68107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable multiple nested "no GC" region requests #68105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix handling of arm64 instruction sets in ilc #68142
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Switch over JIT/Methodical tests to run using merged wrappers #65597
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [LibraryImportGenerator] Fix pointer array marshalling #67988
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating System.Runtime.InteropServices.NFloat to support generic math #68141
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Generate the DAC table on Windows with MSVC linker directives instead of resource injection #68065
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add RL non-generic fixed window, sliding window implementations #68087
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Fix incorrect results of right shifting huge BigIntegers error reported in Issue #65633 #67867
    area-System.Numerics
  • Default interface implementations of static virtual methods - ECMA-335 augments #67619
    documentation
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][jit] Transition the x86 backend to use SSE for fp arithmetic. #65723
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Optimize Matrix4x4 Decompose with fewer stores #66351
    area-System.Numerics, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Additional work for x86 support for NativeAOT #68130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add retry logic to FSW tests File/Directory_Move_Multiple_From_* #68066
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • perf: Fix issues caused by a shared `dotnet` in helix correlation payload directory #67792
    arch-wasm, tenet-performance
  • CheckValue is not a fast path for all callers #68125
    area-System.Reflection-mono, community-contribution
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • WIP Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes incorrect service resolution in Development environment #68053
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Fix Missing Metadata for ThreadPool Event #67150
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Don't cache commandline in coreclr diagnostics server #63356
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.6
  • Move EventPipe thread buffer allocation outside of lock #67936
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • ConfigurationBinder handles ISet<> #68133
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Correct MSVC version in requirements documentation #68078
    community-contribution
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • [DRAFT] Refactor marshaling code into legacy and non-legacy #68004
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Linux-bionic (Android libc w/o Android interop) initial implementation #66147
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add JSON type hierarchies as a preview feature #67961
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Don't remove GT_NO_OP "non-removable" NOP #68114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Use "..."u8 in dotnet/runtime #67733
    area-Meta
  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #68119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unused Private and Public methods are difficult to discover #24911
  • Make ImplicitUsings does not work out of the box with .NET Framework project #24909
  • Compiler crashing when using !! (Bang-Bang-Operator) in async methods #24905

Closed

  • .NET Core SDK 6.0.200: Could not load file or assembly 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis, Version=4.1.0.0' #23972

PullRequests

Created

  • Update the hardcoded net3.1 to the current framework #24900
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #24899
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #24901
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Support multiple runtime packs per FrameworkReference #24873
  • simplify arch for preload library #24870
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24853
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test plan for "file types" #60819
    C# 11.0
  • Code cleanup on save while resolving merge conflicts #60818
  • Quick action "Save to 'as' expression" does not add spaces around "as" #60817
  • Add constructor parameter fails with System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException #60816
  • Symbol completion doesn't work on empty nameof in certain attributes #60812

Closed

  • Use Base Type Where Available refactoring #39905
    Backlog
  • Intellisense should not show GetType for span #38878
    Backlog
  • Completion list for generic constraints contains (and pre-selects) "where" keyword #30785
    Backlog
  • Recommender.GetRecommendedSymbolsAtPosition incorrectly assumes the input SemanticModel is in Workspace.CurrentSolution #60685
    17.3
  • Feature 'Find usages' is currently unavailable due to an internal error. #60132
    17.2
  • ""u8 should use singleton byte array #60643
    17.3
  • [LSP] Semantic tokens `isFinalized` property continually returning false on document open #59777
    17.2
  • "Extract Base Class" does not extract generic type parameters, causing errors in the extracted class #55871
    Backlog
  • Make inputting <see langword="null"/> more ergonomic and discoverable #60814

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix TypeScript code actions #60829
    Area-IDE
  • Add OptProf.json to CI excluded files #60828
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Exclude System.Text.Encoding.CodePages from OptProf #60827
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Handle unexpected keyword rather than identifier for lambda parameter name #60825
    Area-Compilers
  • [LSP] Implement support for `workspace/semanticTokens/refresh` notifications #60824
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • File modifier parsing #60823
    Area-Compilers
  • Changed IDE0059 codefix title in pattern matching #60822
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Add file types to feature status doc #60820
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Do not suggest where keyword in generic constraints when accessing members #60815
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Update status of "Unsigned Right Shift" feature #60821
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Expose new Recommender API #60686
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix up handling for partially written generics #60789
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Simplify the communication between the VS client and OOP further. #60787
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Extract base class extracting generic type parameter now (#55871) #60671
    Area-IDE, Community, Next

Updated

  • Avoid artificial tagging delay when called by consumer that is explicitly blocking for results. #60830
    Area-IDE
  • API for exposing imports (including global imports) from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-approved
  • Add IDE tests for nameof(parameter) and mitigation for speculation issue #60802
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers
  • Initial .NET Framework ARM64 support #60735
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Apply 'require accessibility modifiers' setting on interface methods #60226
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Formatting options fallback and Document extensions #60803
    Area-IDE
  • Fill out test plan for auto-default structs #60688
    Area-Compilers
  • Relax requirements around second parameter of a user-defined shift operator. #60717
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
  • Support ref field declarations from source and metadata #60416
    Area-Compilers
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Fix generate event handler with invalid name (#59935) #60810
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Quarantine InteropTests.InteropTests.ClientCompressedUnary #41248
  • Improve JSON validation schema generation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` #41246
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Adopt consistent approach for defining IVT in the repo #41244
  • Spruce up `OpenApiResponse` creation in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` package #41243
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Results of the Feb 2022 repo survey for dotnet/aspnetcore #41242
  • When sending MultipartFormDataContent from HttpClient, the MediaTypeHeaderValue.TryParse does not handle multipart boundary value enclosed with quotes correctly #41237
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41235
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Poor performance resolving tilde paths in Razor tags #41234
  • Azure Web Swaps Warmup Pings Do Not Support HTTPS #41231
  • Document how to use ASP.NET Core with trimming #41229
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Introduce Results.Typed factory methods for creating results whose types properly reflect the response type & shape #41009
    7.0-preview4
  • Simplify virtualize in flex by setting flex-shrink:0 on placeholders automatically #40262
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Add the code in Counter.razor, press Ctrl + F5 then delete this code, error "ENC0033 Deleting auto-property 'IncrementAmount' requires restarting the application" pop up #41133
  • ASP.NET Core Web App (MVC) generates controller with blocked namespace #39992
  • Hot Reload still not working in VS2022 v17.2 in aspnet core web app #41112
  • CustomAuthenticationProvider does not work as expected(Does not fire NotifyAuthenticationStateChanged(GetAuthenticationStateAsync()); #41228
  • Call to builder.WebHost.UseUrls breaks Blazor Server app in VS17.1.4 #41165
  • Microsoft.Data.SqlClient updated to 4.0.1 #40273
    Discussions

PullRequests

Created

  • Use handler directly in gRPC interop tests #41251
    area-grpc
  • Let it hang for 2 days #41250
  • Consider registering the authentication state provider conditionally #41247
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Split KestrelTrace into multiple files #41245
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Allow Multiple Wildcard Prefix Server Names of the Same Length in SNI Configuration #41240
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Http Response fails when writing more than 255MB #41239
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi package #41238
    area-web-frameworks

Merged

  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks, 7.0-preview4
  • Bump async from 2.6.3 to 2.6.4 in /src/Components/test/E2ETest #41196
    area-blazor, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies, 7.0-preview4
  • Quarantine ClientCompressedUnary #41248 #41249
    7.0-preview4
  • Raise HTTP/2 stream end event in tests with lifetime handler #41230
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4
  • Simplify 'Virtualize' when using 'display: flex' on the scroll container #41241
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview4
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `a1cc8c5` to `80600e5` #41233
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • [SignalR] Add client return results #40811
    area-signalr
  • Add option to not cache assembly references in runtime razor compilation #41086
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    blocked, * NO MERGE *, area-web-frameworks
  • Allow sidebar to scroll for tall menus #41062
    area-mvc, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x
  • Enable trimming for data protection #41118
    area-security, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `ListView` uses the wrong style in WinUI 3 #6209
  • Windows Desktop App fails to run in administrator mode #6208
  • [Android] Setting the background color on entry changes the underline color as well #6207
    6.0.300-servicing
  • Line (horizontal or vertical) does not show #6204
  • [iOS] Properly fix RenderAs for Windows #6203
    6.0.300
  • dotnet-bot image doesn't load on Windows unpackaged app #6202
  • Binding an Item's height and width to another item's height and Width in XAML causes exceptions and unexpected behaviors #6200
  • Toolbar moves when overflow button is pressed #6199
  • Partial Classes in Platform Folders Causing Ambiguity Errors #6198
  • How to use Razor Component Library with .Net MAUI #6194
  • Fix shell `gotoasync` so that the task resolves after navigation has finished on tabs/flyout #6193
    6.0.300-servicing
  • GroupBox component #6190
    Future
  • EF Core migration does not work for IOS #6189
  • Ping in iOS #6187
  • [Android] Changing the style dynamically leaves the colors from the previous style #6183
    6.0.300-rc.3
  • MAUI templates don't show in VS 2022 Preview #6181

Closed

  • bad grid layout in a stack #5344
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Sample app crashes on iOS 12 #6147
  • [Shell] [WinUI] TitleView always shows ShellContent title, even if it's set. #6148
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Shell Absolute Navigation Crashes when a title view is set to each shell page. #5944
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • VisualTreeElementExtensions.GetVisualTreeElements does not work for transformed elements #4613
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Bug] [iOS] Reads "empty list" after last button #3731
    6.0.300
  • Release event is fired twice when hit a button #6095
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Label Formattedtext setting textcolor sets backgroundcolor too #6129
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Negative Padding values fail on Windows work on Android #6182
  • The path 'XXXXXXX\Shared\MainLayout.razor.css' would result in a file outside of the app bundle and cannot be used. #4061
  • CSS Hot Reload for Blazor Hybrid #5751
    6.0.300
  • Hot Reload on MAUI Blazor App does not works. #2527
    6.0.300
  • MAUI project fails to build after changing ApplicationDisplayVersion #6188
  • Crash while trying to to register sync root with the OS in Windows #6136
  • Update Picker modal using DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged. #5557
  • System.MissingMethodException: 'No parameterless constructor defined for type' calling MVVM from Shell in C# #6180
  • CTI scenario: Blazor Hybrid targeting iOS from Windows #4921
    6.0.300
  • Grid Column Layout Is Incorrect #5657
    6.0.300-rc.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Make Android sizing of ShapeViews consistent with iOS and Windows #6206
  • Fix Timing #6197
  • [Windows] Not render shadows on without a ShadowColor #6191
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Support dotnet build with UseMauiCore #6186
    area/single project ☝️, platform/windows 🪟, p/0, fatal, 6.0.300-rc.2

Merged

  • Use known row/column width/height when doing initial measure #6137
    area/layout 🔲
  • Ignore menu code pre iOS13 #6205
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Add Try/Catch wrapper around iOS StatusBar rendering #6201
    partner/ui-tools
  • Fix TitleView swapping behavior on Android/WinUI #6195
    6.0.300-rc.2
  • Clean-up and fix VisualTreeElementExtensions hit testing #5892
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix crash adding/removing SwipeItems dynamically in the SwipeView #6053
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/SwipeView
  • Create custom Automation Peer for MauiButton #6139
    area/a11y, area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [Windows] Avoid Released event fired twice #6184
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-button
  • [Windows] Avoid highlight default color in Label Spans #6185
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, control-label
  • Views spanning both auto and star cells should not contribute to the Auto size #6106
    area/layout 🔲
  • Remove the hard Tizen dependency #6172
    t/bug, p/0, area/infrastructure 🏗️, fatal, partner/tizen, 6.0.300-rc.2

Updated

  • Swap out virtual view when navigating to new Shell Item #6109
    area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • [Android] Show keyboard when Entry, Editor and SearchBar get focus #5995
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0.300-servicing
  • Fix cleanup and wiring up when changing out the content on window #5917
    t/bug, area/shell 🐢, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Improved Shell benchmark #6167
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️
  • Add single target build ProjectCapability #4791
    area/single project ☝️, partner, 6.0.300-rc.2
  • Improvements Droid Lifecycle #2669
    area/lifecycle 🔁, community ✨, .NET 7
  • Move Handler?.UpdateValue after PropertyChanged events #5980
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement BackgroundImageSource in PageHandler #3396
    area/controls 🎮, control-pages, 6.0.300-rc.2

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tracking issue when adding new entity with new navigational properties #27838
  • Merging migrations by manual causes incorrect migration.Designer.cs metadata #27836
  • Add support for Azure SQL Edge reverse engineering #27835
  • "Interesting" navigation named generated by reverse engineering #27832
  • [Always Encrypted] EF Core 6.0 Operand type clash : decimal(29, 27) is incompatible with money encrypted #27831

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.8 to 8.0.9 #27837
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • Remove quirks #27775
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #27830
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Tools: Target .NET 6 to improve compatibility with osx-arm64 #27807
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Remove source-build repo from source-build tarball #13656
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #13655

Merged

  • [main] Re-enable Source Build Tarball Build CI and disable all repo builds #13605

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'main' #13648

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Fix compatibility with BSD df #13653
  • Remove pathcch dependency #13646
